member.name: M:BluewaveLogistics.API.Controllers.ShippingController.CalculateFeeByAddressAndPackage(BluewaveLogistics.API.DTO.DeliveryFeeCalculationRequestDTO)
member.summary: Get delivery fee and ETA for package by dimension and location, within Canada only
member.remarks: Only British Columbia and Ontario provices are supported at the moment. To see all cities, use GetLocations
